title: Fix package metadata and export tests
description:
**Summary:**
Package metadata tests fail, likely due to export changes or version handling.

**Affected Test File:**
- `tests/unit/test_package.py` (2 failures)

**Tests Affected:**
- `test_version_exists`
- `test_all_exports`

**Investigation Tasks:**
1. Verify `__version__` is properly exported
2. Check if expected exports have been removed or renamed
3. Update test expectations to match current public API

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Package version is accessible
- [ ] All expected exports are present
- [ ] Both package metadata tests pass
